settings.title: How long do orders take to ship?
settings.answer: This question depends on which product you purchase. We will send you an email when your products ship though!

settings.title: Do you offer returns?
settings.answer: Yes, we do accept returns. We have a return policy though, which you can view here.

settings.title: What is Influify/ClickCommerce
settings.answer:
Influify - Is a merchandise company, that provides Influencers with an online storefront, support team, and products.

ClickCommerce - Is a merchandise/brand building solution for high volume brands.

settings.content_text: Please don't hesitate to get in touch with us if you have any questions about our products or company! Our team is happy to help and try our best to respond to emails within 24hrs.

settings.title: Our alternate approach to healing + wellness
A blooming community
settings.text:
We want to empower the cannabis industry while also helping people find the right products for them based off of what they need! Often, traditional medicine does not work or becomes too expensive for people to use in their everyday lives. Cannabis has been known to help alleviate medical conditions and improve people's well-being. 

While there has been a stigma attached to cannabis for a long time, we want to erase negative feelings and judgment while helping to educate people on the benefits that using our products may have for them! With an open-mind, we invite you to explore our alternative approach to health + wellness.
